subtask.formula: [featured_dataset['REF'].to_list()[x] if featured_dataset['Left Allele Index'].to_list()[x] == '0' else featured_dataset['ALT'].to_list()[x].split(',',int(featured_dataset['Left Allele Index'].to_list()[x]))[int(featured_dataset['Left Allele Index'].to_list()[x])-1] for x in range(len(featured_dataset['Left Allele Index'].to_list()))]

task_selection.domain_specification: Which are the left alelles of a gene, for each existing position?
task_selection.analytical_specification: Create the left alelle attribute of a gene, for each existing position
task_selection.expected_output: A dataset with a new left alelle attribute
